description:
The daughter of a scientist who developed a deadly bacteria asks Ryo to kill her if she can`t create a vaccine before arms dealers capture her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please Kill Me! Crosshairs Don`t Become a Pretty Girl
Watashi o Koroshite!! Bijo ni Shoujun wa Niawanai
私を殺して!! 美女に照準は似合わない
